title: hn-target
content:
hn-target # We will try to keep the documentation up to date with each update of each script.! exports # It is planned to give you the information through the following exports
addPed exports['hn-target']:addPed('model', 'anim',coords)# Exampleexports['hn-target']:addPed('a_f_y_bevhills_04', 'anim', vector4(100.35, -1077.02, 28.21, 239.06)addObject exports['hn-target']:addObject('model',coords)# Exampleexports['hn-target']:addObject('model',coords)AddTargetPeds exports[''hn-target']:addTargetPeds(name , model, distance, options, BlackList, WhiteList)## Markdown content# Example exports['hn-target']:AddTargetPeds('hn-carinsurance',{'a_f_y_bevhills_04'}, 3.0,{{event = 'hn-carinsurance:open',key = 'hn-carinsurance:open',label = 'Open'}},false,{ coords = {pos = vector3(100.35, -1077.02, 29.21),radius = 2.0}})AddTargetObjects exports[''hn-target']:AddTargetObjects(name , model, distance, options, BlackList, WhiteList)# Example exports['hn-target']:AddTargetObjects('hn-carinsurance',{'a_f_y_bevhills_04'}, 3.0,{{event = 'hn-carinsurance:open',key = 'hn-carinsurance:open',label = 'Open'}},false,{ coords = {pos = vector3(100.35, -1077.02, 29.21),radius = 2.0}})these exports can be updated. it’s still a beta.

title: hn-logs
content:
hn-logs # Standalone system to create logs on our server
hn-logs:LogFields # client TriggerServerEvent('hn-Logs:LogFields', typewebhook, title, Description, color, footer, field, id, tag -- true or false ) server TriggerEvent('hn-Logs:LogFields', typewebhook, title, Description, color, footer, field, id, tag -- true or false ) field # field = { name = 'option Title', value = 'option value', inline = true --true or false } ### Disable description TriggerServerEvent('hn-Logs:LogFields', typewebhook, title, false, color, footer, field, id, tag -- true pr false ) ### Enable Mentions TriggerServerEvent('hn-Logs:LogFields', typewebhook, title, description, color, footer, field, id, true ) hn-logs:SimplyLog # client TriggerServerEvent('hn-Logs:SimplyLog', typewebhook, title, color, 'Inventario', text, tag -- true or false ) server TriggerEvent('hn-Logs:SimplyLog', typewebhook, title, color, 'Inventario', text, tag -- true or false )
